main event: Multiple witnesses reported observing an unidentified flying object in Lincoln and Omaha, Nebraska, on 12 August 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as a large red ball with a green tail and a purple glow,It was believed to be a meteor based on eyewitness accounts,Three witnesses reported the sighting, with one describing the object as a white ball-shaped object the size of a basketball with a tail,The sighting lasted between 5 to 15 seconds,The observers included military personnel and civilians.
sighted object: large red ball with green tail and purple glow
